TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService

summary.span: 创建和管理在工作流运行时引擎上运行工作流实例的线程。

span.span: Creates and manages the threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 默认情况下， 由工作流运行时引擎使用。 is used by the workflow runtime engine by default. 它包括对多个工作流实例在运行时线程池中排队的默认支持。It includes default support for having multiple workflow instances queued in the runtime thread pool. 如果要控制负责执行工作流的线程，请使用 。If you want to control the thread that is responsible for executing the workflow, use .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流运行时引擎从应用程序配置文件加载服务时，会调用此构造函数。This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file. 唯一有效的参数为 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`，该参数可以指定同时运行的工作流数量。The only valid parameter is `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`, which can specify the number of workflows that can be run at the same time. 将 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 设置为很大的值可能导致 .NET 线程池枯竭。Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve. 由于 对象也使用 .NET 线程池，因此这在持久性服务尝试完成持久性事务时会导致超时。This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because objects also use the .NET thread pool. 如果未在构造函数或配置文件中指定，则 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 的默认值对于单处理器计算机为 5，对于多处理器计算机为 (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8)。If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 请注意，由于整数算法的规则所限，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 并非总是与 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maxSimultaneousWorkflows) cil managed

param.name: maxSimultaneousWorkflows
param.span: 一个整数，它确定线程池队列中可以存储的工作流实例的最大数量。

span.span: An integer that determines the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

summary.span: 使用服务可同时运行的、最大指定数目的工作流实例初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified maximum number of workflow instances that the service can run simultaneously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 设置为很大的值可能导致 .NET 线程池枯竭。Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve. 由于 对象也使用 .NET 线程池，因此这在持久性服务尝试完成持久性事务时会导致超时。This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because objects also use the .NET thread pool. 如果未在构造函数或配置文件中指定，则 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 的默认值对于单处理器计算机为 5，对于多处理器计算机为 (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8)。If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 请注意，由于整数算法的规则所限，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 并非总是与 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

span.span: is less than 1.

summary.span: 获取线程池队列中可以存储的最大工作流实例数。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

value.span: 一个整数，它表示线程池队列中可以存储的工作流实例的最大数量。

span.span: An integer that represents the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认值对于单处理器计算机为 5，对于多处理器计算机为 (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8)。The default value for this method is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 请注意，由于整数算法的规则所限，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 并非总是与 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnStarted() cil managed

summary.span: 向 通知工作流实例已开始运行。

span.span: Notifies the that a workflow instance has started to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为等待加入工作流实例线程池的项的列表中的第一个工作项创建线程。 creates a thread for the first work item in the list of items waiting to be included in the workflow instance thread pool.

summary.span: 将工作流实例添加到挂起工作项队列中。

span.span: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue.

summary.span: 停止当前在工作流实例上运行的线程以及任何正在运行的计时器。

span.span: Stops the currently running thread on the workflow instance and any timers that are running.
